name.description: A short human readable title used to refer to the repository in passing

description.description: A moderate length human readable explanation used to help people who are unfamiliar with the repository to understand its purpose

lastModified.description: Date the repository was last modified (ISO-8601 format)

visibility.description: Whether access to the source code is open to the public, to any federal employee, or restricted to a private group of authorized users based on an approved exemption from OCIO.

exemptionUrl.description: URL of the OCIO-approved exemption that prohibits sharing this repository.

url.description: Hyperlink to the repository in which the code is shared, whether public or private

contractAwardUrls.description: List of USASpending.gov award URLs or null if unknown. Providing an empty list [] means that it has been positively affirmed that the custom-developed code and other key technical components in the repository were NOT produced pursuant to a contract.

feedbackMechanism.description: Description of how to contribute or provide feedback
